roleset.name: (try to) make learn, causing to learn
roleset.note: TEACH-V NOTES: Member of VNcls transfer_mesg-37.1.1-1-1. (from teach.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: She was an unstinting teacher who won laurels and inspired students, but she will probably never teach again.

example.name: just subject
example.text: The group says standardized achievement test scores are greatly inflated because teachers often ``teach the test'' as Mrs. Yeargin did, although most are never caught.

example.name: just students
example.text: Encouraged by Mrs. Ward, Mrs. Yeargin taught honor students in the state ``teacher cadet'' program, a reform creation designed to encourage good students to consider teaching as a career.
example.arg: honor students in the state ``teacher cadet'' program, a reform creation designed to encourage good students to consider teaching as a career

example.name: double object
example.text: ``She taught us more in Western Civilization than I've ever learned in other classes,'' says Kelli Green, a Greenville senior.
example.arg: more in Western Civilization than I've ever learned in other classes

example.name: dative almost never occurs
example.text: John teaches quantum mechanics to kindergartners.
